description: Create dashboard home page with stats
steps: Step 1: Create file app/(dashboard)/dashboard/page.tsx

Step 3: Add import: import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'

Step 5: Inside: const supabase = await createClient()
Step 6: Get user: const { data: { user } } = await supabase.auth.getUser()
Step 7: Get membership with org name:
- const { data: membership } = await supabase.from('org_members').select('org_id, organizations(name)').eq('user_id', user!.id).single()
Step 8: Extract: const orgId = membership?.org_id
Step 9: Extract org name: const orgName = (membership?.organizations as any)?.name || 'Your Organization'
Step 10: Get board count: const { count: boardCount } = await supabase.from('boards').select('*', { count: 'exact', head: true }).eq('org_id', orgId)
Step 11: Get changelog count: const { count: changelogCount } = await supabase.from('changelog_entries').select('*', { count: 'exact', head: true }).eq('org_id', orgId)
Step 12: Return JSX:

- p with orgName and className='text-gray-600 mb-8'
- div with className='grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4'

- Card for Changelog showing changelogCount || 0
